Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class LorenzoPlayedPopupController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.LorenzoPlayedPopupController
public class LorenzoPlayedPopupController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the LorenzoPlayedPopup page of the game In this page, which is shown as a popup, the user can see the update popup following a successful action performed by Lorenzo il Magnifico

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane lorenzoPopup
    Attribute that represents the central pane of the page
    javafx.scene.control.Button okButton
    Attribute that represents the button to confirm the view of the popup and close it
    javafx.scene.text.Text textField
    Attributes that represent the textFields where the message of popup is shown It show what action is performed by Lorenzo il Magnifico
    javafx.scene.text.Text title
    Attribute that represents the title of the popup
    javafx.scene.image.ImageView tokenImage
    Attribute that represents the imageView associated at the action performed by Lorenzo il Magnifico

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller

    bottom, center, client, clientState, exitButton, infoButton, mainstage, popup, top, xOffset, yOffset
